00035         void CsgApplication::Initialize(void) {
00036             // register all io plugins
00037             TrajectoryWriter::RegisterPlugins();
00038             TrajectoryReader::RegisterPlugins();
00039             TopologyReader::RegisterPlugins();
00040 
00041             AddProgramOptions()
00042                     ("top", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  atomistic topology file");
00043             if (DoMapping()) {
00044                 if (DoMappingDefault()) {
00045                     AddProgramOptions("Mapping options")
00046                             ("cg", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  coarse graining mapping definitions (xml-file)")
00047                             ("no-map", "  disable mapping and act on original trajectory");
00048                 } else {
00049                     AddProgramOptions("Mapping options")
00050                             ("cg", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  [OPTIONAL] coarse graining mapping definitions\n"
00051                             "  (xml-file). If no file is given, program acts on original trajectory");
00052                 }
00053             }
00054 
00055 
00056             if (DoTrajectory())
00057                 AddProgramOptions("Trajectory options")
00058                 ("trj", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  atomistic trajectory file")
00059                 ("begin", boost::program_options::value<double>()->default_value(0.0), "  skip frames before this time")
00060                 ("first-frame", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(0), "  start with this frame")
00061                 ("nframes", boost::program_options::value<int>(), "  process so many frames")
00062                 ;
00063 
00064             if (DoThreaded())
00068                 AddProgramOptions("Threading options")
00069                 ("nt", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(1), "  number of threads")
00070                 ;
00071 
00072         }
00073 
00074         bool CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions(void) {
00075             _do_mapping = false;
00076             CheckRequired("top", "no topology file specified");
00077 
00078             // check for mapping options
00079             if (DoMapping()) {
00080                 // default mapping is on
00081                 if (DoMappingDefault()) {
00082                     // if the user does not explicitly ask to turn it off, cg is needed
00083                     if (OptionsMap().count("no-map") == 0) {
00084                         CheckRequired("cg", "no coarse graining definition specified");
00085                         _do_mapping = true;
00086                     }
00087                 }// default mapping is off, if user gives cg, then do mapping
00088                 else if (OptionsMap().count("cg")) {
00089                     _do_mapping = true;
00090                 }
00091             }
00092 
00093             /* check threading options */
00094             if (DoThreaded()) {
00095                 _nthreads = _op_vm["nt"].as<int > ();
00096                 /* TODO
00097                  * does the number of threads make sense?
00098                  * which criteria should be used? smaller than system's cores?
00099                  */
00100             }
00101 
00102             return true;
00103         }

00105         void CsgApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out) {
00106             string name = ProgramName();
00107             if (VersionString() != "")
00108                 name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00109 
00110             HelpTextHeader(name);
00111             HelpText(out);
00112             out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00113         }
00114 
00115         void CsgApplication::Worker::Run(void) {
00116             while (_app->ProcessData(this)) {
00117                 if (_app->SynchronizeThreads()) {
00118                     int id = getId();
00119                     _app->_threadsMutexesOut[id]->Lock();
00120                     _app->MergeWorker(this);
00121                     _app->_threadsMutexesOut[(id + 1) % _app->_nthreads]->Unlock();
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         bool CsgApplication::ProcessData(Worker * worker) {
00127 
00128             int id;
00129             id = worker->getId();
00130 
00131             if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00132                 //wait til its your turn
00133                 _threadsMutexesIn[id]->Lock();
00134             }
00135             _traj_readerMutex.Lock();
00136             if (_nframes == 0) {
00137                 _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00138 
00139                 if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00140                     //done processing? don't forget to unlock next worker anyway
00141                     _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 return false;
00145             }
00146             _nframes--;
00147             if (!_is_first_frame || worker->getId() != 0) {
00148                 //get frame
00149                 bool tmpRes = _traj_reader->NextFrame(worker->_top);
00150                 if (!tmpRes) {
00151                     _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00152                     if (SynchronizeThreads())
00153                         _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00154                     return false;
00155                 }
00156             }
00157             if (worker->getId() == 0)
00158                 _is_first_frame = false;
00159 
00160             _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00161             if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00162                 //unlock next frame for input
00163                 _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00164             }
00165             //evaluate
00166             if (_do_mapping) {
00167                 worker->_map->Apply();
00168                 worker->EvalConfiguration(&worker->_top_cg, &worker->_top);
00169             } else
00170                 worker->EvalConfiguration(&worker->_top);
00171 
00172             return true;
00173         }
00174 
00175         void CsgApplication::Run(void) {
00176             TopologyReader *reader;
00177             // create reader for atomistic topology
00178             reader = TopReaderFactory().Create(_op_vm["top"].as<string > ());
00179             if (reader == NULL)
00180                 throw runtime_error(string("input format not supported: ") + _op_vm["top"].as<string > ());
00181 
00182             class DummyWorker : public Worker {
00183             public:
00184 
00185                 void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref) {
00186                     _app->EvalConfiguration(top, top_ref);
00187                 }
00188             };
00189 
00190             // create the master worker
00191             Worker *master = NULL;
00192             if (DoThreaded())
00193                 master = ForkWorker();
00194             else
00195                 master = new DummyWorker();
00196 
00197             master->setApplication(this);
00198             master->setId(0);
00199             _myWorkers.push_back(master);
00200 
00201             CGEngine cg;
00202 
00204             // read in the topology for master
00206             reader->ReadTopology(_op_vm["top"].as<string > (), master->_top);
00207             cout << "I have " << master->_top.BeadCount() << " beads in " << master->_top.MoleculeCount() << " molecules" << endl;
00208             master->_top.CheckMoleculeNaming();
00209 
00210             if (_do_mapping) {
00211                 // read in the coarse graining definitions (xml files)
00212                 cg.LoadMoleculeType(_op_vm["cg"].as<string > ());
00213                 // create the mapping + cg topology
00214                 master->_map = cg.CreateCGTopology(master->_top, master->_top_cg);
00215 
00216                 cout << "I have " << master->_top_cg.BeadCount() << " beads in " << master->_top_cg.MoleculeCount() << " molecules for the coarsegraining" << endl;
00217                 master->_map->Apply();
00218                 if (!EvaluateTopology(&master->_top_cg, &master->_top))
00219                     return;
00220             } else
00221                 if (!EvaluateTopology(&master->_top))
00222                 return;
00223 
00225             // Here trajectory parsing starts
00227             if (DoTrajectory() && _op_vm.count("trj")) {
00228                 double begin;
00229                 int first_frame;
00230                 bool has_begin = false;
00231 
00232                 if (_op_vm.count("begin")) {
00233                     has_begin = true;
00234                     begin = _op_vm["begin"].as<double>();
00235                 }
00236 
00237                 _nframes = -1;
00238                 if (_op_vm.count("nframes")) {
00239                     _nframes = _op_vm["nframes"].as<int>();
00240                 }
00241 
00242                 first_frame = _op_vm["first-frame"].as<int>();
00243 
00244                 // create reader for trajectory
00245                 _traj_reader = TrjReaderFactory().Create(_op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00246                 if (_traj_reader == NULL)
00247                     throw runtime_error(string("input format not supported: ") + _op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00248                 // open the trajectory
00249                 _traj_reader->Open(_op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00250 
00252                 // Create all the workers
00254                 for (int thread = 1; thread < _nthreads && DoThreaded(); thread++) {
00255                     Worker *myWorker = ForkWorker();
00256                     myWorker->setApplication(this);
00257                     myWorker->setId(thread);
00258                     _myWorkers.push_back(myWorker);
00259 
00260                     // this will be changed to CopyTopologyData
00261                     // read in the topology
00262                     reader->ReadTopology(_op_vm["top"].as<string > (), myWorker->_top);
00263                     myWorker->_top.CheckMoleculeNaming();
00264 
00265                     if (_do_mapping) {
00266                         // create the mapping + cg topology
00267                         myWorker->_map = cg.CreateCGTopology(myWorker->_top, myWorker->_top_cg);
00268                     }
00269                 }
00270 
00272                 // Proceed to first frame of interest
00274 
00275                 _traj_reader->FirstFrame(master->_top);
00276                 if(master->_top.getBoxType()==BoundaryCondition::typeOpen) {
00277                     cout << "NOTE: You are using OpenBox boundary conditions. Check if this is intended.\n" << endl;
00278                 }
00279                 //seek first frame, let thread0 do that
00280                 bool bok;
00281                 for (bok = true; bok == true; bok = _traj_reader->NextFrame(master->_top)) {
00282                     if (((master->_top.getTime() < begin) && has_begin) || first_frame > 1) {
00283                         first_frame--;
00284                         continue;
00285                     }
00286                     break;
00287                 }
00288                 if (!bok) { // trajectory was too short and we did not proceed to first frame
00289                     _traj_reader->Close();
00290                     delete _traj_reader;
00291 
00292                     throw std::runtime_error("trajectory was too short, did not process a single frame");
00293                 }
00294 
00295                 // notify all observers that coarse graining has begun
00296                 if (_do_mapping) {
00297                     master->_map->Apply();
00298                     BeginEvaluate(&master->_top_cg, &master->_top);
00299                 } else
00300                     BeginEvaluate(&master->_top);
00301 
00302                 _is_first_frame = true;
00304                 //start threads
00305                 if (DoThreaded()) {
00306                     for (int thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++) {
00307 
00308                         if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00309                             Mutex *myMutexIn = new Mutex;
00310                             _threadsMutexesIn.push_back(myMutexIn);
00311                             // lock each worker for input
00312                             myMutexIn->Lock();
00313 
00314                             Mutex *myMutexOut = new Mutex;
00315                             _threadsMutexesOut.push_back(myMutexOut);
00316                             // lock each worker for output
00317                             myMutexOut->Lock();
00318                         }
00319                     }
00320                     for (int thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++)
00321                         _myWorkers[thread]->Start();
00322 
00323                     if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00324                         //unlock first thread and start ordered input/output
00325                         _threadsMutexesIn[0]->Unlock();
00326                         _threadsMutexesOut[0]->Unlock();
00327                     }
00328                     // mutex needed for merging if SynchronizeThreads()==False
00329                     Mutex mergeMutex;
00330                     for (int thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++) {
00331                         _myWorkers[thread]->WaitDone();
00332                         if (!SynchronizeThreads()) {
00333                             mergeMutex.Lock();
00334                             MergeWorker(_myWorkers[thread]);
00335                             mergeMutex.Unlock();
00336                         }
00337                         delete _myWorkers[thread];
00338                     }
00339                     for (int thread = 0; thread < _threadsMutexesIn.size(); ++thread) {
00340                         delete _threadsMutexesIn[thread];
00341                         delete _threadsMutexesOut[thread];
00342                     }
00343 
00344 
00345                 } else {
00346                     master->Run();
00347                     delete master;
00348                 }
00349 
00350                 EndEvaluate();
00351 
00352                 _myWorkers.clear();
00353                 _threadsMutexesIn.clear();
00354                 _threadsMutexesOut.clear();
00355                 _traj_reader->Close();
00356 
00357                 delete _traj_reader;
00358             }
00359 
00360             delete reader;
00361 
00362         }
00363 
00364         CsgApplication::Worker::~Worker() {
00365             if (_map)
00366                 delete _map;
00367 
00368         }
00369 
00370         void CsgApplication::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology * top_ref) {
00371             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00372             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00373                 (*iter)->BeginCG(top, top_ref);
00374         }
00375 
00376         void CsgApplication::EndEvaluate() {
00377             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00378             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00379                 (*iter)->EndCG();
00380         }
00381 
00382         void CsgApplication::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology * top_ref) {
00383             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00384             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00385                 (*iter)->EvalConfiguration(top, top_ref);
00386         }

00388         CsgApplication::Worker *CsgApplication::ForkWorker(void) {
00389             throw std::runtime_error("ForkWorker not implemented in application");
00390             return NULL;
00391         }
00392 
00393         void CsgApplication::MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker *worker) {
00394             throw std::runtime_error("MergeWorker not implemented in application");
00395         }
